thread.title: Watch: Guy fails hilariously trying to catch ball at Yankees game
thread.title_full: Watch: Guy fails hilariously trying to catch ball at Yankees game

title: Watch: Guy fails hilariously trying to catch ball at Yankees game
text:
By Cox Media Group National Content Desk 
Don't hate the player; hate the game. 
That's what one Yankees fan learned the hard way earlier this week. 
The guy, who was sitting on the third base line, multiple chances to make a simple catch yet he struck out, figuratively speaking. 
>>Read more trending stories 
The first miss was on a pop fly. The second was on a ground ball, but the third wasn't even during game action. The ball boy threw a simple toss to get the guy the ball, and not only did he get hit in the face, but he also got laughed at by a woman, too. 
Take a look for yourself below: Think you're having a bad day? You could be this guy at Yankee Stadium tonight. #epicfail pic.twitter.com/knsQkcBFPJ â€” Lionel Bienvenu (@lionelbienvenu) September 30, 2015 
Ouch.
